duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and document business requirements and expected impact, acting as a bridge between clients, project managers, and technical staff.
Develop business specs at the start of a technical project and analyze, plan, design, document, or make recommendations to improve business processes.
Partner with Subject Matter Experts (SME) to help verify that all requirements have been met.
Use basic analytical or relational database software such as Excel or SQL to quantify the anticipated impact of work.
Independently manage multiple responsibilities, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines. Partner with Cross Functional Teams to drive requirements to completion.
Exercise the ability to use Past DDI experience, but not required. Excellent written and verbal communication.
Ability to travel up to 25%. Work in a fast-paced environment where you will learn daily and a rewarding Job that will quickly become a career.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, IT, or a related field (Master's preferred)
